articles.title: Federal Reserve warns of growing geopolitical risks to global financial system - Financial Times
articles.description: US central bank says Middle East conflict and war in Ukraine threaten ‘spillovers’ to markets
articles.content:
Escalating geopolitical tensions pose a threat to the global financial system amid heightened risks of higher inflation and slower growth, the Federal Reserve warned on Friday.

articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried asked FTX attorney to 'come up' with legal argument for $8B hole - Cointelegraph
articles.description: Sam Bankman-Fried allegedly instructed FTX’s former general counsel Can Sun to “come up” with a legal explanation for the $8 billion hole in Alameda Research’s books.
articles.content: Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried instructed former general counsel Can Sun to come up with any legal explanation for the $8 billion hole in Alameda Researchs books, according to Suns testimony in cou… [+2580 chars]

articles.title: LSE outage halts some trading; blue chips spared - Reuters UK
articles.description: The London Stock Exchange (LSE) (LSEG.L) said it is preparing to resume normal trading on Friday after an incident disrupted activity earlier on Thursday.
articles.content:
LONDON, Oct 19 (Reuters) - The London Stock Exchange (LSE) (LSEG.L) said it is preparing to resume normal trading on Friday after an incident disrupted activity earlier on Thursday.
